title: How to play
text:
Parity is a numbers puzzle game.
The aim of the game is to get each number on the a 9x9 board of numbers to be exactly the same.

title: How to play
text: One of the numbers is always selected. This number can be moved by using the arrow keys

title: How to play
text: Each time you move the selector, the number you select will increase in number by one.

title: Negative numbers
text: Numbers on the board can be negative too.

title: The End
text: Congratulations, you've successfully finished all the levels in the game.
